= Introduction =

Brief overview in importing the project to Eclipse IDE.


= Details =

  * Eclipse 3.4.x for artifacts prior to rewrite *0.5a*:
    * [EclipseTomCatQuickStart TomCat6.0] : this page contains info regarding importing the example WAR and adding the generated Jar artifacts to a new Dynamic Web Project.
    * [EclipseJBossQuickStart JBoss4.2] : this page contains info regarding importing the example WAR and adding the generated Jar artifacts to a new Dynamic Web Project.
  * Eclipse 3.6.x for artifacts after the rewrite *0.5a*:
    * [EclipseTomCatQuickStart TomCat7.0] : this page contains info regarding importing the example WAR and adding the generated Jar artifacts to a new Dynamic Web Project.
    * [EclipseJBossQuickStart JBoss6.0] : this page contains info regarding importing the example WAR and adding the generated Jar artifacts to a new Dynamic Web Project.
